Citation_Information.author_list: Mainzer, A., Bauer, J., Cutri, R., Grav, T., Kramer, E., Masiero, J., Sonnett, S., and Wright, E.
Citation_Information.description: Definition of reference codes used in NEOWISE PDS tables

External_Reference.reference_text: Grav, T., J.M. Bauer, A.K. Mainzer, J.R. Masiero, C.R. Nugent, and 3 others, NEOWISE: Observations of the Irregular Satellites of Jupiter and Saturn, Astroph. J. 809, 3, doi:10.1088/0004-637X/809/1/3, 2015

Bauer, J.M., T. Grav, E. Blauvelt, A.K. Mainzer, J.R. Masiero, and 20 others, Centaurs and Scattered Disk Objects in the Thermal Infrared: Analysis of WISE/NEOWISE Observations, Astroph. J. 773, 22, doi:10.1088/0004-637X/773/1/22, 2013.

Field_Delimited.name: Ref_code
Field_Delimited.description: 5-character reference code used in PDS tables
